title: Very wide sans on "The Sweeney" movie poster
content:
I am drawing a blank on this extended sans serif while I feel I should know it. Can anyone help me? Here's the [original poster](http://web.archive.org/web/20130818131705/http:/www.heyuguys.co.uk/images/2012/05/The-Sweeney-poster.jpg).

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130818131705im_/http:/typophile.com/files/The-Sweeney_typography_3507.jpg)
author: Bald Condensed

comments.content:
> I feel I should know it

You always do ;-)

Should be [Stainless](http://web.archive.org/web/20130818131705/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/stainless/).
Jan, you're the best. I did look through the Font Bureau website looking for it but seem to have missed it. Thanks! :)
